root: ^boro-chan：What else? You think I could sell it?
^boro-chan：But. You have to write a 5-star review on Wellp, 25+ words, with pictures.
^boro-chan：Also send out a tweet on Z, hashtag TreasureIceShop hashtag Huanmen hashtag BoroStinkySmellHeavenlyTaste...
^Me：(What a complicated request!) But... I don't have a cell phone.
^Me：(Is she mad?) Sorry, I didn't know...
^Me：Perhaps I could pay for the DIY...
^boro-chan：Promise me that you'll <color=green>mention Boro-chan to five different people</color>.
^Me：(<color=green>mention Boro to five people</color>? That wouldn't be hard, I feel.) Promise.
^boro-chan：That's more like it. I'll post the photo myself, and if your ice is the most popular in five days, you can still come for the Grand Prize.
^boro-chan：Tommorow afternoon, you'll come to the beach...and, well...
^boro-chan：For... Actually, forget it... It's really not necessary...
^Me：(Hey, I've seen a poster about that cosplay event somewhere.)
^Me：But you just told me you're just you? Why is it a cosplay again?
^boro-chan：Boro-chan is me, so I only know how to play Boro-chan.
^Me：...... (I feel that she has misunderstood the word "cosplay".)
^Me：You know, I'll definitely be there for you.
^boro-chan：Really? Nice! Come to the ice stand more often too~~!
